about_the_game:
On a fateful day, the Sword of Will goes missing from the Sacred Altar, stripping the human Kingdom of its strength. The hellish monsters from the surrounding lands become emboldened, marching out of the darkness and attacking our villages. There had been a Prophecy of old that this day would come. That a knight would rise and quell this darkness. Many brave warriors have ventured out, fighting back the monsters, in search of the Sword of Will…but none have returned. As you work, forging armour for the Kingdom, you meet a Stranger in the wilderness that commissions you for a dangerous quest.

Key Features

  • Blacksmithing
    Knight Foretold has a fully modular armour system, allowing you to create and equip a variety of armour and gear sets. Blacksmithing requires materials like iron, steel, leather, and more. To learn to make higher level gear players improve their proficiency and equipment, while also finding Blacksmith Plans throughout the game world. These are the long-lost armour designs of renowned Blacksmiths from ages passed.

  • Gear Blessings
    When blacksmithing or upgrading gear, items may receive a Blessing, which augments and enhances its gameplay possibilities. Different armour pieces with all types of Blessings can be worn at the same time, stacking all the enhancements and bonuses, to create a truly unstoppable Knight.

  • Parkour
    Parkour allows players to traverse almost any obstacle. The parkour is a smart and dynamic system where your character knows how to navigate all types of obstacles and sizes. You’ll be able to jump, slide, dive, roll, and flip under or over: boxes, barrels, fences, tables, crevasses, holes, broken pillars, and more!

  • Combat
    The combat system is visceral and dynamic with a repertoire of different attacks that inflict your might on the enemy. Attacks range from running-jump attacks, Bashing your shield into enemy faces, and spartan kicks. The combat also adjusts the impact according to the player's speed and strength, hitting enemies harder and dealing more damage.

  • Treasure
    Opening Chests with your hands, like a normal person, is boring…kick the hell out of it like a true Warrior instead! There are many Chests located around the game world and in dungeons. Loot them all! They contain all kinds of goodies like: Weapons, Armour, Blacksmith Plans, Materials, Health Potions, Gold, and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core 2.6GHz x86-compatible
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 Ti or ATI Radeon™ HD 7850
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: As a young blacksmith forging armour for the Kingdom, you meet a Stranger in the wilderness that commissions you for a dangerous quest. Through Him your armour receives special blessings, enhancing your combat abilities, and leading you down the path of an old prophecy.
